# iosxr_tftp_server (Resource)

This resource can manage the TFTP Server configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_tftp_server" "example" {
  vrfs = [
    {
      vrf_name                = "VRF1"
      ipv4_server_access_list = "ACL1"
      ipv4_server_max_servers = "no-limit"
      ipv4_server_homedir     = "disk0:"
      ipv4_server_dscp        = "default"
      ipv6_server_access_list = "ACL1"
      ipv6_server_max_servers = "no-limit"
      ipv6_server_homedir     = "disk0:"
      ipv6_server_dscp        = "default"
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `vrfs` (Attributes List) VRF name for TFTP service (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--vrfs))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--vrfs"></a>
### Nested Schema for `vrfs`

Required:

- `vrf_name` (String) VRF name for TFTP service

Optional:

- `ipv4_server_access_list` (String) Access list
- `ipv4_server_dscp` (String) Set IP DSCP (DiffServ CodePoint) for TFTP Server Packets
- `ipv4_server_homedir` (String) home directory
- `ipv4_server_max_servers` (String) Set number of allowable UDP max servers
- `ipv6_server_access_list` (String) Access list
- `ipv6_server_dscp` (String) Set IP DSCP (DiffServ CodePoint) for TFTP Server Packets
- `ipv6_server_homedir` (String) home directory
- `ipv6_server_max_servers` (String) Set number of allowable UDP max servers

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_tftp_server.example ""
```
